long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cat Trap for Chrome Extension is an engaging game that will put your quick thinking and strategic skills to the test. The objective of the game is to trap a mischievous cat within a board filled with ticked boxes. Your goal is to lock the cat inside and prevent it from escaping.

Every day, "Cat Trap" attracts a large number of players who enjoy its simple yet addictive gameplay. To succeed in this game, you'll need to employ various strategies and utilize your wit. Each time you click on a panel, the cat will make a move in a certain direction, and it's up to you to outsmart it and keep it trapped within your panel.

You can play "Cat Trap" for free on the website https://monkeymart.org/. Give it a try and see if you can outmaneuver the crafty feline!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://monkeymart.org/
